oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: We Six - 1940-1m-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program We Six, circa late 1940. Recorded in WSM's Studio B, with announcer David Cobb and musicians Harold Johnson, Ovid Collins Jr., and Red Hawn (violins); Pietro Brescia (viola); Oscar Eiler (cello); and Owen Bradley (vibraharp).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: We Six; Owen Bradley; Harold Johnson; Pietro Brescia; Ovid Collins Jr.; Red Hawn; Oscar Eiler
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Just Boogie Woogie (We Six) -- David Cobb talks -- London Bridge Is Falling Down (We Six) -- David Cobb talks -- Lazy Winter (We Six) -- David Cobb talks -- Papa Haydn's Day Off (We Six) -- Theme -- Closing statement (David Cobb) -- Bulova Watch commercial (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); We Six (Radio program); We Six (Musical group); Cobb, David (Announcer); Bradley, Owen; Johnson, Harold (Musician); Collins, Ovid; Brescia, Pietro; Hawn, Red; Eiler, Oscar
